title: What Mike Vrabel said about Drake Maye’s shoulder injury
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots “I try not to have a whole lot of concern.
" Drake Maye is dealing with a shoulder injury.

(AP Photo/Ashley Landis) By Conor Ryan January 29, 2026 | 4:06 PM 1 minute to read FOXBOROUGH — Drake Maye might have landed on the Patriots’ simulated injury report on Wednesday evening, but Mike Vrabel isn’t sounding any alarms over the health of his quarterback more than a week away from Super Bowl LX.

title: Rhode Island man finds exotic lizard while shoveling driveway
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Off Beat Exactly how the reptile ended up in Providence remains a mystery.
A Providence man found an exotic tegu lizard while shoveling his driveway this week.

New England Wildlife Center By Abby Patkin January 29, 2026 | 1:04 PM 1 minute to read Shoveling a New England driveway rarely yields more than a soggy newspaper or half-dead patch of grass, but a Rhode Island man made the find of a lifetime this week when he unearthed an exotic lizard.
